price: Mereka berkata, "Hai Nūḥ, sesungguhnya kamu telah berbantah dengan kami dan kamu telah memperpanjang bantahanmu terhadap kami, maka datangkanlah kepada kami azab yang kamu ancamkan kepada kami jika kamu termasuk orang-orang yang benar".
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰنُوحُ قَدۡ جَٰدَلۡتَنَا فَأَكۡثَرۡتَ جِدَٰلَنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yānūḥu qad jādaltanā fa-aktharta jidālanā fatinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
